content: मेखला {@--1@} A belt, girdle, waistband, zone in general (<ab>fig.</ab> also); anything which girds or surrounds; मही सागरमेखला ‘the sea-girt earth’; रत्नानुविद्धार्णवमेखलाया दिशः सपत्नी भव दक्षिणस्याः <ls>R. 6. 63</ls>; <ls>Rs. 6. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Particularly, the girdle or zone of a woman; नितंबबिंबैः सदुकूलमेखलैः <ls>Rs. 1. 4</ls>, <ls n="Rs. 1.">6</ls>: <ls>R. 8. 64</ls>; मेखलागुणैरुत गोत्रस्खलितेषु बंधनं <ls>Ku. 4. 8.</ls> {@--3@} The triple girdle worn by the first three castes; cf <ls>Ms. 2. 42.</ls> {@--4@} The slope of a mountain (नितंब); आमेखलं संचरतां घताना <ls>Ku. 1. 5</ls>; <ls>Me. 12.</ls> {@--5@} The hips. {@--6@} A sword-belt. {@--7@} A swordknot or string fastened to the hilt. {@--8@} The girth of a horse. {@--9@} <ab>N.</ab> of the river Narmadā.
